alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Essex; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 25 at 12:24PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT MONDAY... An Air Quality Alert remains in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 9 AM EDT Monday. The Vermont Agency of Natural Resources has issued an Air Quality Health Advisory for the following counties in Vermont... Grand Isle, Franklin, Orleans, Essex, Chittenden, Lamoille, Caledonia, Washington, and Addison. Fine particle pollution from Quebec wildfire smoke will cause the Air Quality Index (AQI) to approach or exceed the Orange or Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups category. Some occasional deterioration into the Red, or Unhealthy for All Groups category may also occur during this period, especially near the Canadian Border. All groups in the Alert area should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion. Take more breaks during outdoor activities. Sensitive groups include people with heart or lung disease, older adults, children, and teenagers. It`s OK to be active outside, but take more breaks and do less intense activities. Watch for symptoms such as coughing or shortness of breath. People with asthma should follow their asthma action plans and keep quick-relief medicine handy. If you have heart disease: symptoms such as palpitations, shortness of breath, or unusual fatigue may indicate a serious problem. If you have any of these, contact your healthcare provider. For additional information, please visit AirNow.gov. An Air Quality Action Day means that particulate concentrations within the region may approach or exceed unhealthy standards. For additional information...please visit the Vermont Agency of Natural Resources web site at... https://dec.vermont.gov/air-quality/local-air-quality-forecasts.
